text: Judith Kennedy (October 25, 1944 - April 15, 2018) was an American politician and businesswoman. She was a member of the Democratic Party until 2015. In 2011, Kennedy was elected Mayor of Newburgh, New York, serving in the office until her death in 2018. She was born in Salmon, Idaho. In the 1990s, she worked for Hewlett-Packard. Kennedy died under hospice care of ovarian cancer on April 15, 2018 in Newburgh at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York (state) Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Idaho Category:Politicians from Oregon Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Writers from Idaho Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:Writers from Oregon Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from Idaho Category:Businesspeople from Oregon Category:People from Newburgh, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Judy Kennedy
